comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: "I was consumed by an intense thirst for school work, and hurled myself into it with tremendous zest..." --Maude Abbott Canadian medical researcher Maude Abbott, born Maude Elizabeth Seymour Babin (1869-1940); expert on heart disease; curator of the McGill Pathological Museum, professor of pathology at McGill University, co-founder of the Federation of Medical Women of Canada (1924), chief of pathology, Women's Medical College of Pennsylvania. Diego Rivera represented Abbott in a mural for the Institute of Cardiology in Mexico City--she's the only Canadian in the picture. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maude_Abbott www.virtualmuseum.ca/Exhibitions/Medicentre/en/abbo_print... www2.marianopolis.edu/quebechistory/encyclopedia/abbottma... www.collectionscanada.ca/women/002026-401-e.html
